09/23/15, 12:01 PM EDT
To Donald Trump, "God is the ultimate."
In a recent interview with CBN News' "The Brody File," the Republican candidate marveled at his wealth and good fortune at Trump National Golf Club in Rancho Palos Verdes, California, outside of Los Angeles.
"You know, you look at this? Here we are on the Pacific Ocean. How did I ever own this? I bought it 15 years ago. I made one of the great deals, they say, ever. I have no more mortgage on it as I will certify and represent to you. And I was able to buy this and make a great deal," Trump explained. 
Trump said he wants to make great deals for the country, but that "God is the ultimate."
"I mean, God created this," Trump said, pointing to his golf course, "and here’s the Pacific Ocean right behind us. So nobody, no thing, no there’s nothing like God.”
 © 2015 POLITICO LLC
title: Trump on his golf course: 'God created this'
